sourcesContent:
export const servicesData = [
  {
    title: "Maintenance Management",
    description: "Comprehensive maintenance services to keep your facility running smoothly and efficiently.",
    imageUrl: "https://source.unsplash.com/random/100x100/?maintenance",
    features: [
      "Preventive maintenance planning",
      "Corrective maintenance",
      "Equipment servicing and repair",
      "Building systems maintenance",
      "Emergency response services"
    ]
  },
  {
    title: "Security Services",
    description: "Protect your assets, employees, and visitors with our professional security services.",
    imageUrl: "https://source.unsplash.com/random/100x100/?security",
    features: [
      "Access control systems",
      "Surveillance systems",
      "Security personnel",
      "Security audits and assessments",
      "Emergency and evacuation planning"
    ]
  },
  {
    title: "Cleaning Services",
    description: "Keep your facility clean, sanitary, and presentable with our professional cleaning services.",
    imageUrl: "https://source.unsplash.com/random/100x100/?cleaning",
    features: [
      "Regular janitorial services",
      "Deep cleaning",
      "Specialized cleaning",
      "Waste management",
      "Green cleaning practices"
    ]
  },
  {
    title: "Energy Management",
    description: "Optimize energy usage to reduce costs and environmental impact while maintaining comfort.",
    imageUrl: "https://source.unsplash.com/random/100x100/?energy",
    features: [
      "Energy audits and assessments",
      "Energy-saving implementations",
      "Utility consumption monitoring",
      "Renewable energy solutions",
      "Sustainability planning"
    ]
  },
  {
    title: "Space Management",
    description: "Maximize the efficiency and functionality of your facility's space utilization.",
    imageUrl: "https://source.unsplash.com/random/100x100/?space",
    features: [
      "Space planning and design",
      "Occupancy management",
      "Workspace optimization",
      "Move management",
      "Space utilization analysis"
    ]
  },
  {
    title: "Emergency Planning",
    description: "Be prepared for any emergency with comprehensive planning and response protocols.",
    imageUrl: "https://source.unsplash.com/random/100x100/?emergency",
    features: [
      "Emergency response planning",
      "Disaster recovery",
      "Staff training and drills",
      "Regular plan updates and testing",
      "Coordination with local authorities"
    ]
  }
];
